title: Skin Suggestions - Ba-Gnar-na
body:
It's rather obvious in my opinion how this skin will turn out.

Mini-Gnar: Gnar looking like a monkey or in a monkey costume (like Dino Gnar).
Q: Gnar would throw a rang shaped like a banana (or two connected together) instead of his rang.
W: Gnar would possibly a ring of Bananas around his target.
E: No significant change suggested.
R: No significant change suggested.

Mega-Gnar:
Q: Gnar would throw a bunch of banana's instead of his boulder.
W: No significant change suggested.
E: No significant change suggested.
R: No significant change suggested.

What do you guys think? My friends and I think it's a great idea, can envision it and would buy it.

replies.body: So, Diddy Gnar and Donky Kong Gnar?
His E is Mini Gnar form could leave behind a banana colour trail thing, because the bounce is in a curve shape, like a banana.
Order of the baGnarna... Gnar, nice idea, just that banana's been took already.

But.. I NEED a full banana team...



No one ever suspects the banana.
Shut up and take my money! {{champion:16}}
it should totally be liek a ... mango.

Ahanga {{champion:150}}
No one ever suspects  the bannana{{champion:16}}
